rows.label: tlk4750016502_msg0001
rows.name:
Hmm... Let me indulge you in
a story from years back.

rows.label: tlk4750016502_msg0002
rows.name:
I'm sure you're well aware of the
stone monument at the village outskirts,
our resident Village Guardian?

rows.label: tlk4750016502_msg0003
rows.name:
Beneath that lies the resting place of
Adel.

rows.label: tlk4750016502_msg0004
rows.name:
It's his blessing that has protected us
from strife and allowed us to live in
a state of peace and tranquility.

rows.label: tlk4750016502_msg0005
rows.name:
The King of Luxuria claims to have
been descended from Adel, but in
actual fact, he's not blood-related.

rows.label: tlk4750016502_msg0006
rows.name:
What?! You already knew that?
Well, you're more versed in the ways
of the world than this old geezer...
